plot: Tamra sits down with Slade to hash out their past, but will they forgive and forget? Later, Gretchen and Slade seek couple's counseling while Alexis attempts to mend fences with Tamra.

Vicki is torn between spending the evening with Brooks and babysitting her grandson Troy. Meanwhile, Lydia convinces Alexis to meet with Tamra for the first time since their fight. Gretchen visits a fertility doctor, and Lydia tries to accept that her mother won't stop smoking marijuana. Tamra gives a powerful speech at the Los Angeles Women's Expo where she reveals shocking details of her past.—Anonymous
